property.name: amisfinder.xslt.useSaxon
property.description: Wether to use Saxon or Standard JVM XSLT parser

property.name: amisfinder.xslt.file
property.description: The XSLT file to use for transformation

property.name: amisfinder.xslt.output.debug.file
property.description: The output of the tranformation for debug purpose (log level "DEBUG" shall be activated)
